synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaked in an acetone solution for 3 days
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated for another 10 h under dynamic vacuum at 70 °C
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Formulated as [Ni(DTBDA)(MeOH)2(DMA)(H2O)2]n. Single crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD) analysis demonstrates that FJI-H36 crystallizes in the C2/c space group.

synthesis_conditions.time: soaked for 3 days, activated for 10 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: PXRD test demonstrates that the peaks of desolvated FJI-H36 are different from that before desolvation, implying that a new structure is formed.

SCXRD analysis indicates that about 2.5 mmol g-1 adsorbed-C2H2 can be precisely determined in the pores of FJI-H36. The framework of FJI-H36 undergoes complex structural transformations after C2H2 adsorption.
